com.here.android.mpa.search

Class TextSuggestionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Request<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>
      • com.here.android.mpa.search.TextSuggestionRequest
  • Deprecated. 
    As of SDK 3.3, replaced by TextAutoSuggestionRequest.

    @Deprecated
public class TextSuggestionRequest
extends Request<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>
    Represents an extended Request used to retrieve a List of search terms by way of Places search services.

    A search location context must be provided by setting either a search center using setSearchCenter(GeoCoordinate) or a bounding map viewport using setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox). Failing to set a map viewport will result in an ErrorCode.INVALID_PARAMETER when executing the request.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextSuggestionRequest

        public TextSuggestionRequest(java.lang.String partialTerm)
        Deprecated. 
        Default constructor.

        Creates a request to return a list of suggested search terms that are related to a specified location context and a partial search term.

        A search location context must be provided by setting either a search center using setSearchCenter(GeoCoordinate) or a bounding map viewport using setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox). Failing to set a map viewport will result in an ErrorCode.INVALID_PARAMETER when executing the request.

        Parameters:
        partialTerm -

    • Method Detail

        public TextSuggestionRequest setSearchCenter(GeoCoordinate center)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the search center.
        Parameters:
        center - The GeoCoordinate representing the location context used to search for nearby places.
        Returns:
        The TextSuggestionRequest.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The TextSuggestionRequest.

      • setRichTextFormatting

        public TextSuggestionRequest setRichTextFormatting(RichTextFormatting value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets a RichTextFormatting to be used in request responses. The default formatting is RichTextFormatting.HTML.
        Parameters:
        value - Desired RichTextFormatting
        Returns:
        This TextSuggestionRequest object

      • getCollectionSize

        public int getCollectionSize()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the current collection size being used for request responses.
        Returns:
        The current response collection size

      • setCollectionSize

        public TextSuggestionRequest setCollectionSize(int value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets a collection size to be used for request responses. The maximum number of result items in each collection will be limited to this value. The valid value range is [1..100]. The default collection size is 20.
        Parameters:
        value - Desired response collection size per request.
        Returns:
        This TextSuggestionRequest object

      • setMapViewport

        public TextSuggestionRequest setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox mapViewport)
        Deprecated. 
        The map viewport is a bounding box of the map area currently visible to the user. The viewport can act as an implicit location context in the absence of an explicit location context. To ensure you get the best results possible, you should always set a viewport if there is a map visible to the user.
        Parameters:
        mapViewport - The bounding box of the map area currently visible.

      • execute

        public ErrorCode execute(ResultListener<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Executes an asynchronous request.
        Parameters:
        listener - A ResultListener passed along with the request to monitor progress
        Returns:
        The ErrorCode representing an appropriate result
